content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sometimes there is necessity to grant someone access to the project without assigning workload. E.g. PM needs to engage some Consultant and Trainer for some activities. In this case PM/PC can use simplified Member position for granting mostly read access to project materials.
